about_the_game:
Jigsaw Savant is a unique game combining gorgeous puzzles with an engaging and fun story about saving Christmas. You'll complete over 100 puzzles (with 4 difficulty levels to choose from and up to 615 pieces) as the story slowly unravels and you can save Christmas.

Apart from story mode you'll find challenges, achievements and a global high score chart. Race to finish the puzzles first, or play on higher difficulties with multiplies for disabling hints, snapping or adding rotation.

Whether you're a fan of visual novels or digital jigsaws, Jigsaw Savant has everything you need.

  • Immerse yourself in a warm, welcoming Christmas environment (classical music, fire, warm graphics).
  • Tired of losing puzzle pieces to your cat? Enjoy the new Realistic mode. You’ll feel like working with a Real Life puzzle. But without all the drawbacks and with many digital advantages.
  • Check your genius level against historical figures (and cute animals).
  • Challenge yourself with many pieces puzzles (up to 615) and difficulty modes (easy, normal, hard, realistic). +Challenging score multiplier feature.

  • Quickly relax with easy puzzles in 5 minute breaks (hints included).
  • Discover unique jigsaw mechanics in story mode.
  • Fine tune the game to your taste! Lots of customization options to change how the game behaves.

  • Don't worry about losing your progress. Autosave feature included (during gameplay). You can also see a screenshot of your saved puzzle.
  • Enjoy 30+ hours of high quality opera, classical and other relaxing music.
  • Come back any time to your unfinished puzzles (automatic save upon exit).
  • Prepare yourself for long hours of entertainment and relaxation. 200+ in-game achievements await your magical touch!

  • Each puzzle also has mini-achievements. In total the game has 2000+ achievements to unlock.
  • Beautify your desktop by downloading a well deserved wallpaper (after completing a puzzle)

  • Make the game look behave like you want! Customize various background colors and other options.
  • Remove the frustration of having a cluttered puzzle! Use the hugely large in-game bins (and their intuitive functionality).

  • Immerse yourself in an engaging Christmas story! Can you save Christmas?
  • No more staring closely into the screen! Use the versatile magnifying glass to navigate the beautiful puzzles.

  • Become smarter and happier! Listening to classical music it’s proven to increase intellect!
  • Feast your eyes with classical painting masterpieces!
  • Get help from the community with a click (included Discord button in menu).

  • Forget the pain of hunting for corner pieces. Have them available separately with a button click.

  • Manage pieces with ease by using the flexible arrange patterns.
  • Keep track of the time spent in game.
  • Enjoy the satisfaction of gaining large score multipliers (by finishing earlier)
